description.narrative: A total of 2199 U-reporters participated and expressed their opinion through 8 different polls focused on Childs rights, adolescent participation, quality of education and School dropout and Violence against children.A total of 1350 adolescents specially the most disadvantaged participated in public debates about violence against children through participatory theater | Status:On-track | As-of Date:07/01/2019
